Class RandomEvent

java.lang.Object
RandomEvent
public class RandomEvent extends Object
This class determines whether the random events (that happen every night) are to be executed or not.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Angelo Gasmin

  • Method Details

    • shouldLevelUp

      public boolean shouldLevelUp(Monster monster)
      Determines whether or not each monster in the player's party should level up or not. This is dependent on the monster's current tier.
      Parameters:
      monster - The monster that might level up
      Returns:
      Boolean for if the chosen monster should level up or not

    • shouldLeave

      public boolean shouldLeave(Team team, double faints)
      Determines whether or not each monster in they player's party should leave. This is dependent on the number of times each monster has fainter.
      Parameters:
      team - The Player's party of monsters
      faints - The number of times a monster has fainted
      Returns:
      Boolean for if the chosen monster should leave.

    • shouldJoin

      public boolean shouldJoin(Team team)
      Determines whether or not a random monster can join the player's team. This is dependent on the number of monster's that are already in the player's team.
      Parameters:
      team - The player's team
      Returns:
      Boolean for if a randomMonster should join
